scenario_text.value:
(This is, like...some kind of divine
punishment.)
The surgery is scheduled for tomorrow.
Huh? T-tomorrow?

The nurse will explain the procedure.
I’ll explain things to your parents in the—
H-hold on a second!
...Is something the matter?
Is something the...? Isn’t this too sudden?

You said this would be a regular checkup.
Why are we talking about surgery?

Nothing to be surprised about. Getting better
should be your top priority right now.

That’s why you should get the surgery as soon
as humanly possible.
I’m sick of hearing that.

They always push me to go under the knife,
but that doesn’t mean it’ll fix me.
Besides, I’ve been pretty good lately, right?
Saki...

This is a comparatively stable period, so
most of your symptoms have subsided, but...

We have no idea when your illness will
worsen. This is quite a frightening disease.

Young people like you recover quickly due to
your metabolic activity. At the same time...

My illness progresses quickly, so the moment
it worsens, it’ll eat me inside-out... Right?
I’ve heard this so much my ears bled.

Then you understand that a stable period like
this is the best time for surgery, don’t you?
(Yeah, you don’t have to tell me. Still...)

You postponed the last surgery, too, didn’t
you? We have to hurry and—

Next week! Just wait until next week!
Pretty please?!

Next week... Well I’ll ask, but could you at
least tell me what’s going on?

Ah, well... You see... Oh, I have camp next
week! Yeah, that’s it!

I wanna make memories to last a lifetime!
Please?
Memories for a lifetime, huh...

Yeah! You know how important things like that
are, don’t you?

Well then, once that’s over... You’ll consent
to the surgery, right?
Does a bear poop in the woods? Duh.
(It’s a lie, of course...)
(I really don’t wanna have that surgery.)

(I just concocted some story about making
memories for a lifetime...)
(I was just scared.)

(The surgery could fail, and me with it.
I was so scared...)

(I even postponed the last surgery. I just
wanted a chance to be with my friends.)

(Still, I ended up fighting with my friends
anyway... What a joke.)

(Running from that important surgery, then
losing my friends...)
(...I hate it. I hate myself like this.)

(If someone like me disappeared, I doubt
anyone would miss me...!)
